title: Ëmans
body:
History

Origins - The Age of Creation

When the Spirits learned of their planet's innevitable doom, various species were created in an attempt to save the planet. The Ermans were the first of the four races, created by Edrenine. Ultimately they failed to provide what was needed to save the planet due to their apathetic, albeit gentle, nature.

The Age of Races

When Urunine created the race of the Dommahound, the two races instantly clashed due to their conflicting natures. Erman-Dommahound Conflict continued throughout The Age of Races until finally the Ermans were victorious, maked by the end of The War of Ruin. However, they suffered heavy casualities themselves and vowed never to fight again.

The Age of Empires - The Age of Awakening

The Ermans remained in perpetual stagnation for the remainder of the ages. Their cities fell into ruin, and in their apathy and lesser numbers there was no motivation to rebuild them. They submitted their lives to an opium-like drug in their belief that pleasure was the ultimate reason for existence.

Genealogy

Reproduction

Ëmans do not reproduce in the same way as their Human and Astanan counterparts, and instead share the same method of reproduction as their Dommahound enemies. An Erman is genetically neither male nor female, but a combination of both, and their perceived gender of masculine or feminine traits merely an expression of their genetic makeup. However, only those whose genes expressed the individual to be a female had the ability to reproduce, yet no form of procreation was required. Via a biological signal involving hormonal balances relating to lower levels of stress - a method designed by Edrenine to encourage harmony and civility within the race - a “female” Erman can only bare offpsring when her body deems it safe to do so. They carry their child for a complete Moon.

Their offspring look very similar their Bearer (the name given to the carrier of the child - the concepts of Mother and Father were unknown), but not identical.

Genealogy & The Three Families

When Edrenine first created the Ermans, he made only three. These were Gabadin, Kũbadin and X. Subsequent generations of Ermans named these three the Ivömas, meaning "The Great Leaders".

  • Gabadin
  • - Baradin
  • -- Renöra
  • --- Ћẽneska
  • ---- Nabüsk
  • ---- Tobã
  • --- Çaramin
  • ---- Tavamin
  • ---- Đäspĩ
  • -- Mevus
  • --- Tabĩ
  • --- Sarëmäta

Location

The Ermans settled in the North-East parts of the Seen Lands. Here they built a number of great cities including the largest, Naustaun. Their lands stretch from the Balmare Range in the West to the far lands to the East on the other side of the Tantovf River.
preface: The Ëmans are an immortal race of humanoid created by Edrenine during The Age of Creation. By The Age of Empires they had been completely forgotten by the other races, except for the five surviving Dommahound.

title: Ëmans
body:
History

Origins - The Age of Creation

When the Spirits learned of their planet's innevitable doom, various species were created in an attempt to save the planet. The Ermans were the first of the four races, created by Edrenine. Ultimately they failed to provide what was needed to save the planet due to their apathetic, albeit gentle, nature.

The Age of Races

When Urunine created the race of the Dommahound, the two races instantly clashed due to their conflicting natures. Erman-Dommahound Conflict continued throughout The Age of Races until finally the Ermans were victorious, maked by the end of The War of Ruin. However, they suffered heavy casualities themselves and vowed never to fight again.

The Age of Empires - The Age of Awakening

The Ermans remained in perpetual stagnation for the remainder of the ages. Their cities fell into ruin, and in their apathy and lesser numbers there was no motivation to rebuild them. They submitted their lives to an opium-like drug in their belief that pleasure was the ultimate reason for existence.

Genealogy

Reproduction

Ëmans do not reproduce in the same way as their Human and Astanan counterparts, and instead share the same method of reproduction as their Dommahound enemies. An Erman is genetically neither male nor female, but a combination of both, and their perceived gender of masculine or feminine traits merely an expression of their genetic makeup. However, only those whose genes expressed the individual to be a female had the ability to reproduce, yet no form of procreation was required. Via a biological signal involving hormonal balances relating to lower levels of stress - a method designed by Edrenine to encourage harmony and civility within the race - a “female” Erman can only bare offpsring when her body deems it safe to do so. They carry their child for a complete Moon.

Their offspring look very similar their Bearer (the name given to the carrier of the child - the concepts of Mother and Father were unknown), but not identical.

title: Ëmans
body:
History

Origins - The Age of Creation

When the Spirits learned of their planet's innevitable doom, various species were created in an attempt to save the planet. The Ëmans, created by Edrenaen, were the first of the four races to be created by the Spirits. Ultimately they failed to provide what was needed to save the planet due to their apathetic, albeit gentle, nature.

The Age of Races

See timeline

The Age of Empires - The Age of Awakening

The Ëmans remained in perpetual stagnation for the remainder of the ages. Their cities fell into ruin, and in their apathy and lesser numbers there was no motivation to rebuild them. They submitted their lives to an opium-like drug in their belief that pleasure was the ultimate reason for existence.

Genealogy

The Ivömas

When Edrenaen first created the Ëmans he made only three, all of which were female. They were called the Ivömas:

  • Gabadin ♀.
  • Kuibadin ♀.
  • Töbadin ♀.


The Mivïmas

Each of the Ivömas gave birth to a daughter. They were called the Mivïmas:

  • Gabadin ♀ gave birth to Baradin ♀.
  • Kuibadin ♀ gave birth to Buiþadin ♀.
  • Töbadin ♀ gave birth to Vönadin ♀.


The Three Lines

Each of the Mivïmas gave birth to one son and one daughter:

  • Baradin gave birth to Renöra ♀ and Mevus ♂.
  • Buiþadin gave birth to Zoileek ♀ and Sarëmäta ♂.
  • Vönadin gave birth to Doiðolomem ♀ and Kukïstra ♂.


Three lines were formed when Edrenaen commanded the Ëmans to undergo the Rites of Union:

The Line of Renöra & Sarëmäta:

  • Ћẽneska ♂
  • Nabüsk ♀
  • Tobãn ♂
  • Çaramin ♀
  • Poträ ♀


The Line of Şõlẽk & Mevus:

  • Beraş ♂
  • Tabĩ ♂
  • Movënö ♂


The Line of Kukïstra & Tabĩ

  • Mantẽtë ♂
  • Tavamin ♀
  • Đäspĩ ♀

Location

The Ëmans settled in the North-East. Their lands stretch from the Balmare Range in the West to the far lands to the East on the other side of the Tantovf River.

Genealogy

The Ivömas

When Edrenaen first created the Ëmans he made only three, all of which were female. They were called the Ivömas:

  • Gabadin ♀.
  • Kuibadin ♀.
  • Töbadin ♀.


The Mivïmas

Each of the Ivömas gave birth to a daughter. They were called the Mivïmas:

  • Gabadin ♀ gave birth to Baradin ♀.
  • Kuibadin ♀ gave birth to Buiþadin ♀.
  • Töbadin ♀ gave birth to Vönadin ♀.


The Three Lines

Each of the Mivïmas gave birth to one son and one daughter:

  • Baradin gave birth to Renöra ♀ and Mevus ♂.

  • Vönadin gave birth to Doiðolomem ♀ and Kukïstra ♂.

  • Mantẽtë ♂
  • Tavamin ♀
  • Đäspĩ ♀

The Ëmans settled in the North-East. Their lands stretch from the Barmarä Range in the West to the far lands to the East on the other side of the Tantov River.

When Edrenaen first created the Émans he made only three, all of which were female. They were called the Ievómást:

  • Gwieðil ♀.
  • Kwuiðil ♀.
  • Twoeðil ♀.


The Mivómást

Each of the Ivömas gave birth to a daughter. They were called the Mivómást:

  • Gwieðil ♀ gave birth to Barád ♀.
  • Kwuiðil ♀ gave birth to Nefad ♀.
  • Twoeðil ♀ gave birth to Vonád ♀.


The Three Lines

Each of the Mivïmas gave birth to one son and one daughter:

  • Barád gave birth to Renóra ♀ and Mevus ♂.
  • Nefad gave birth to Şolek ♀ and Sarémáta ♂.
  • Twoeðil gave birth to Doiðolomem ♀ and Kukestra ♂.


Three lines were formed when the Ivömas commanded the children of the Mivïmas to undergo the Rites of Union:

The Line of Renöra & Sarëmäta:

  • Ћẽneska ♂
  • Nabüsk ♀
  • Tobãn ♂
  • Çaramin ♀
  • Poträ ♀


The Line of Şõlẽk & Mevus:

  • Beraş ♂
  • Tabĩ ♂
  • Movënö ♂


The Line of Kukïstra & Tabĩ

  • Mantẽtë ♂
  • Tavamin ♀
  • Đäspĩ ♀

Location

The Ëmans settled in the North-East. Their lands stretch from the Barmarä Range in the West to the far lands to the East on the other side of the Tantov River.
preface: The Ëmans are an immortal race of humanoid created by Edrenaen during The Age of Creation. By the dawn of The Age of Empires, they had been forgotten by the Ћumans.

title: Ëmans
body:
History

Origins - The Age of Creation

When the Spirits learned of their planet's innevitable doom, various species were created in an attempt to save the planet. The Ëmans, created by Edrenaen, were the first of the four races to be created by the Spirits. Ultimately they failed to provide what was needed to save the planet due to their apathetic, albeit gentle, nature.

The Age of Races

See timeline

The Age of Empires - The Age of Awakening

The Ëmans remained in perpetual stagnation for the remainder of the ages. Their cities fell into ruin, and in their apathy and lesser numbers there was no motivation to rebuild them. They submitted their lives to an opium-like drug in their belief that pleasure was the ultimate reason for existence.

Genealogy

  • Twoeðil gave birth to Doiðolomem ♀ and Kukestra ♂.

  • Poträ ♀

Pale skin, delicate features, almost sickly looking

Genealogy

The Ievómást

When Edrenaen first created the Émans he made only three, all of which were female. They were called the Ievómást:

  • Gwieðil ♀.
  • Kwuiðil ♀.
  • Twoeðil ♀.


The Mivómást

Each of the Ivömas gave birth to a daughter. They were called the Mivómást:

  • Gwieðil ♀ gave birth to Barád ♀.
  • Kwuiðil ♀ gave birth to Nefad ♀.
  • Twoeðil ♀ gave birth to Vonád ♀.


The Three Lines

Each of the Mivïmas gave birth to one son and one daughter:

  • Barád gave birth to Renóra ♀ and Mevus ♂.
  • Nefad gave birth to Şolek ♀ and Sarémáta ♂.
  • Twoeðil gave birth to Doiðolomem ♀ and Kukestra ♂.


Three lines were formed when the Ivömas commanded the children of the Mivïmas to undergo the Rites of Union:

The Line of Renöra & Sarëmäta:

  • Ћẽneska ♂
  • Nabüsk ♀
  • Tobãn ♂
  • Çaramin ♀
  • Poträ ♀


The Line of Şõlẽk & Mevus:

  • Beraş ♂
  • Tabĩ ♂
  • Movënö ♂


The Line of Kukïstra & Tabĩ

  • Mantẽtë ♂
  • Tavamin ♀
  • Đäspĩ ♀

Location

The Ëmans settled in the North-East. Their lands stretch from the Barmarä Range in the West to the far lands to the East on the other side of the Tantov River.
preface: The Ëmans are an immortal race of humanoid created by Edrenaen during The Age of Creation. By the dawn of The Age of Empires, they had been forgotten by the Ћumans.
